act_info.full_title: Children and Youth in Care Day Act, 2014, S.O. 2014, c. 2
act_info.citation: Children and Youth in Care Day Act, 2014, S.O. 2014, c. 2

content.section: Children and Youth in Care Day
content.content: 1. May 14 in each year is proclaimed as Children and Youth in Care Day. 2014, c. 2, s. 1. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2014, c. 2, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2014, c. 2, s. 3. ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1. May 14 in each year is proclaimed as Children and Youth in Care Day. 2014, c. 2, s. 1.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 2014, c. 2, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). 2014, c. 2, s. 3.

______________
